LanguageData.ParanoidRambling6: Our old lives are gone. We are shadows of the dead!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling7: This miserable place will be our tomb!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling8: The sooner we die, the sooner the suffering ends!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling9: You fools! You are puppets on strings!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling10: Can't you see? We are mere playthings!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling11: They laugh at our torment! They cackle!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling12: Are you happy now? We are all going to die!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling13: You stand a stone's throw from oblivion!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling14: The worst is yet to come! We are not prepared!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling15: It's all hopeless! We're wasting our time!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling16: Why are we here? Just to suffer?
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling17: Our minds are not our own!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling18: Your foolishness has doomed us all!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling20: This accursed hellhole will be our grave!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling21: We are mere pawns in the hands of fate!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling22: I'm wasting my time. You are all blind and deaf!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling23: It will never get better! We will never be saved!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling24: We have never been more alone and unwanted!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling25: We work, we sicken, we die, and for what?
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling26: Any one of you could die at any moment!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling27: We are all better off dead!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling28: This is just a dream, we can still wake up!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling29: Every moment you draw breath prolongs the agony!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling30: If anyone was looking out for us, would we be in such dire straits?
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling32: They drive us mad! Make us eat each other!
LanguageData.ParanoidRambling33: They want to keep us penned here like animals!
LanguageData.FellMurmuring3: I can't let {0_objective} get away with it...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring10: I must do this myself... no one can be trusted.
LanguageData.FellMurmuring11: For the good of us all...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring23: Behind my back... always behind my back...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring24: The source of all our problems...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring28: I'll wait until the time is right...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring29: I will cure this place of its blight!
LanguageData.FellMurmuring30: If no one else will do it, I will.
LanguageData.FellMurmuring31: None of them see it... they're all so blind...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring32: I can do this... I must do this...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring35: {0_pronoun} will be the death of me...
LanguageData.FellMurmuring36: I should have done this long ago...
